body_content.explanation: If you have no alternative, you only have one reasonable choice or decision to make. :
examples: You've given me no alternative. I'm afraid we have to let you go.
I don't want to leave, but I have no alternative.
Congress has no alternative. They must pass the legislation immediately or face the consequences.
Your terrible behavior has left me with no alternative.
Surgery is the only option - there is no alternative.
